message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. I believe this price reflects the value that the product will bring to you, and it's a fair compromise between our initial offers.

I understand that you're looking for a higher price, but I'm not comfortable going above $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1200000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
